    1. Staff(String, char[], String, Gender, int)

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.auth.User
com.group6.hms.app.roles.Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Pharmacist
public abstract class Staff extends User
The Staff class is an abstract representation of staff members (Admin, Doctor, Pharmacist etc.) It extends the User class and contains common attributes and methods shared by all staff roles.

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      protected Staff(String userId, char[] password, String name, Gender gender, int age)
      Constructs a Staff with the specified user details.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique user ID of the staff member
      password - the password of the staff member, represented as a character array
      name - the name of the staff member
      gender - the gender of the staff member, represented as a Gender enum
      age - the age of the staff member
